venue.name: Moot Court Room, Suffolk University Law School

item.description: See www.fordhallforum.org for details on the Forum's Spring 2011 programs. They run from 3/24 to 5/19, mostly on Thursdays from 6:30 PM to 8PM, all located downtown.
item.why: Topics run the gamut and the speakers are always excellent. Ford Hall Forum programs are FREE, open to the public, and leave plenty of time for the audience to question and challenge the speakers.
item.name: Ford Hall Breakfast Forum: Wikileaks
